wikipedia_page.main:
Kane Palma-Newport (born 26 October 1990) is an English rugby union player, who plays as a prop for French side US Colomiers in Pro D2.
A product of the Bath Rugby academy, Palma-Newport made his Aviva Premiership debut as a substitute against Newcastle in the 2010-11 season.He spent a brief period on loan at Leeds Carnegie during the 2011-12 season, scoring two tries in six appearances. His loan came to an end when he was recalled by Bath.
